subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets are playing up to expectations as a result of better defense and more 3-point shooting, but they will encounter an equally hot team in the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday at Barclays Center.
snippet: The Nets are playing up to expectations as a result of better defense and more 3-point shooting, but they will encounter an equally hot team in the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday at Barclays Center.
